NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: Daz, I seem to be unable to retrieve a conversation I wrote using this projection stone. Could there be an issue with its data?
2 1
DAZ: My love, I'm afraid you misunderstand! Conversations shared across projection stones are not recorded on the stone itself, like scrolls are - they are recorded on projection walls!
3 2
DAZ: The projection walls at both ends of the conversation record these shared conversations, and allow Nomai to view them again using the corresponding projection stones.
4 3
DAZ: To find the conversation you seek, you will need to use the corresponding projection stone at the projection wall it was written on!
5 3
DAZ: This applies for any conversation shared across a projection wall! A single projection stone can unlock many conversations across different projection walls.
6 5
CASSAVA: Oh! Goodness, no wonder I could not find so many conversations I had written before.. You have my gratitude, Daz!
WorkshopTop EX4 3
WorkshopTop EX5 4
